jobs.title: Junior JS/Python developer
jobs.description:
At TechBiz Global, we are providing recruitment service to our TOP clients from our portfolio. We are currently seeking a Junior JS/Python developer to join one of our clients' teams in Berlin. This part-time role is ideal for individuals passionate about ESG initiatives and eager to contribute to building tools that make a difference.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with the development team to design and implement web-based applications using JavaScript and Python.

  • Assist in developing and maintaining backend services and APIs.

  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging processes.

  • Contribute to the integration of ESG data sources and analytics tools.

  • Stay updated with emerging technologies and propose improvements to enhance our platform.

Qualifications

Required:

  • Proficiency in JavaScript (e.g., React, Vue.js) and Python (e.g., Django, Flask).

  • Understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.

  • Familiarity with version control systems like Git.

  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

  • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

Preferred:

  • Experience with ESG data or sustainability reporting tools.

  • Knowledge of database systems (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).

  • Exposure to cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization tools like Docker.

    What We Offer:

  • Flexible working hours accommodating your schedule.

  • Opportunity to work on meaningful projects impacting ESG practices.

  • Collaborative and supportive team environment.

  • Professional growth and learning opportunities in the ESG tech space.
